description: BIDS RECEIVED BY FAX AND EMAIL WILL BE ACCEPTED AS OFFICIAL. Parks Canada is not currently accepting bids via SAP Ariba, you must submit your bid VIA FAX OR EMAIL AS INDICATED IN THE SOLICITATION DOCUMENT.BIDS..., ...
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Number: 5P468-22-0142/A

**Project Title:** Abatement and Demolition of a Building at 113B McDermot Avenue, Wood Buffalo National Park

**Project Overview:**
Parks Canada is seeking a qualified contractor to abate and demolish a building located at 113B McDermot Avenue, Wood Buffalo National Park, Alberta. The project scope includes, but is not limited to, the following:

* Abate hazardous materials
* Remove all windows and doors
* Demolish the building
* Backfill the foundation area

#### Key Dates:
* Tender Closing Date: October 27, 2022, at 16:00 hours
* Contract Performance Date: No later than February 28, 2023
* Goods and Services to be Delivered: On-site, Wood Buffalo National Park, Alberta

#### Bidding Requirements:

* Bids must be received by fax or email only, as indicated in the solicitation document.
* Bidders must submit their bids in accordance with the specified requirements, which include sending documents as attachments, not links.
* Bidders are responsible for any failure attributable to the transmission or receipt of the emailed bid.
* Late submissions will not be considered.

#### Information:
* This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Policy Framework, RESERVATION OF PROCUREMENT FOR INDIGENOUS BUSINESSES.
* Bidders must obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contacts:**
* 
* 
* Carmen Song
 Phone: 604-358-9479
 Email: [carmen.song@pc.gc.ca](mailto:carmen.song@pc.gc.ca)
 Fax: 1-855-983-1808
